SEARCH
Package main

Class Maze

java.lang.Object
main.Maze
public class Maze extends Object
Class representing a maze. A maze consists of a 2D array of cells, with a start position, an end position, and a difficulty level. The maze also has a creation date and a name. The class provides methods for generating a maze, loading a maze from a file, and saving a maze to a file.
Author:
ANTONELLI Paul, HENRIQUES Valentin, BOUGRAIN Nathan

  • Constructor Details

    • Maze

      public Maze(int _rows, int _columns, int in_x, int in_y, int out_x, int out_y, int _Difficulty, int _seed)
      Constructs a new maze with the given number of rows, columns, start and end positions, and difficulty level.
      Parameters:
      _rows - the number of rows in the maze
      _columns - the number of columns in the maze
      in_x - the x-coordinate of the start position
      in_y - the y-coordinate of the start position
      out_x - the x-coordinate of the end position
      out_y - the y-coordinate of the end position
      _Difficulty - the difficulty level of the maze (1 for Easy, 2 for Normal, 3 for Hard)

    • Maze

      public Maze(String filename) throws Exception
      Constructs a new maze by loading it from the given file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file to load the maze from
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an error reading from the file
